user_form: Please fill the form to start game :)
name: Name
please_select_number_between: Please select a number between 3 and 10
instructions: 1. The escape room is generated by AI based on your choices.
2. You will receive a description of the room and four options to progress.
3. Each choice will lead to the next scenario generated by the AI.
4. Find the option that leads to escaping the room.
completed: You have successfully completed Escape AI
